value.title: StarCraft 2: EPIC GAME - Serral vs SKillous!
value.excerpt: Awesome game of professional StarCraft 2 between Serral (Zerg) and SKillous (Protoss). In this 40+ minute long match we see Brood Lords, Ultralisks, Infestors, Vipers, Lurkers, Zerglings and more from the Zerg. Protoss focuses on Stalkers, Oracles, Zealots, Motherships, Carriers and Tempests to counter

value.excerpt: Lazarus Wastes is one of the winning maps in StarCraft 2 with the Team Liquid Map Contest 17 (TLMC17). Map is made by HoperONE and has a few unique features.
